Topic.Title: help! we need somebody! we suck at this koding and need a teacher

Posts.EditableText:
**hello!**

 we are 2 norwegians that is trying to build a game reddy for **saturday**. we thought "pff, easy" we now understand.. nope, not so easy! especially when the code decides to do stuff you dont know how to fix. we are wondering if someone would like to join us through Discord and guide us through this on, let say friday? or when ever you have the time? we have started a game and made some plans, but struggling to get the game to be nice and playful.. it does not like us. its going to be launched for 4000+ people.. the pressure is **high!** :O 

- my discord user: peer91#5301
